name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Reliability Engineer with a strong foundation in performance analysis and root cause analysis, I leverage my 8 years of experience in the healthcare and financial sectors to enhance system reliability and efficiency. My structured working method ensures thorough documentation management, critical for compliance and improved operational metrics. I utilize machine learning insights to develop predictive maintenance strategies, optimizing Mean Time Between Repairs (MTBR). 
My background includes overseeing the integration of mechanical systems, including pumps and mechanical seals, which are crucial for maintaining optimal performance. Additionally, I possess excellent English communication skills to convey complex technical concepts to cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment in project goals.
